Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.
The _____ of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have even gathered a fan base.
In certain parts of Galar, _____ was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.
Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.
Its strange cries sound like human language. There are some musicians who compose songs for _____ to sing.
It sways its hips to a rhythm all its own. The precise movements of _____ living in Alola are truly wonderful.

_____ walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.
It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said.
It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
It speaks a language similar to that of humans. However, it seems to use dancing to communicate.
It rocks its body rhythmically. It appears to alter the rhythm depending on how it is feeling.
A _____ sashays rhythmically as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without noticing.
It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
